text: Patrick Vieira (born 23 June 1976) is a French professional football head coach and former player. He was the manager of Crystal Palace from 2021 to 2023. He played for Arsenal and France national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Cannes 1993–94 Division 1 5 0 1 0 – – 6 0 1994–95 31 2 2 1 1 0 4 1 38 4 1995–96 13 0 0 0 0 0 4 0 17 0 Total 49 2 3 1 1 0 8 1 61 4 AC Milan 1995–96 Serie A 2 0 1 0 – 2 0 5 0 Arsenal 1996–97 Premier League 31 2 3 0 3 0 1 0 38 2 1997–98 33 2 9 0 2 0 2 0 46 2 1998–99 34 3 5 1 1 0 3 0 43 4 1999–2000 30 2 2 0 1 0 14 0 47 2 2000–01 30 6 6 1 0 0 12 0 48 7 2001–02 36 2 7 0 0 0 11 1 54 3 2002–03 24 3 5 0 1 0 12 1 42 4 2003–04 29 3 5 0 3 0 7 0 44 3 2004–05 32 6 6 1 0 0 6 0 44 7 Total 279 29 48 3 11 0 68 2 406 34 Juventus 2005–06 Serie A 31 5 3 0 1 0 7 0 42 5 Inter Milan 2006–07 Serie A 20 1 3 0 1 2 4 1 28 4 2007–08 16 3 3 0 1 0 3 0 23 3 2008–09 19 1 2 0 – 3 0 24 1 2009–10 12 1 1 0 1 0 2 0 16 1 Total 67 6 9 0 3 2 12 1 91 9 Manchester City 2009–10 Premier League 13 1 1 0 0 0 – 14 1 2010–11 15 2 8 3 1 0 8 0 32 5 Total 28 3 9 3 1 0 8 0 46 6 Career total 456 45 73 7 17 2 105 4 651 58 * In League Cup, including Charity Shield and Supercoppa ItalianaPatrick Vieira – Century of International Appearances. rsssf.org (16 July 2009).
